column4: hi everyone, hey my sound is limping but will play waves. won't record.  skype hangs etc etc.   i've got a lame onboard via 8233 sound chip  (works with Mepis)  any hints on how to get skype working with this?
i dont remember hte fix off the top of my head. check the site :O
sm4sh install gstreamer... i think thats what you need
airways, add "universe" onto the lines like the one i showed you
